name: Terry Turner
text: When I got a new office chair that wasnt what we thought it was they gladly replaced it with one that was acceptable. Bought several power tools and other items that worked perfectly as desired. Reputable people.

name: Kathy Nelon
text: Not a very clean or organized business. It was also EXTREAMLY hot as they have no a/c.

name: Rickey White
text: I bought a dryer used it for a couple of days and it stopped working. I called the store and was told to bring it back to get it checked out and when I told him it would not be easy because I am a Disabled Veteran so I asked for my money back he hung up and when I called back would not answer. Sorry business. Do not do business with them!

name: Joel Bittner
text: If I knew they were tossing out more stuff then they put up I would just go to the dumpster to shop. If people only knew where there stuff goes it would be a lot less stuff in the store. Although they have good prices I will still shop there I really thank they should not do what they do to surplus stuff but don’t toss it in the dumpster put it in a bin for sale  a dime a bag sounds good!!!

resp.text: We only throw away stuff that is btoken or stained  and we appreciate  your concern ty

name: Julie Bartlett
text: Make sure you know all the POLICIES before you shop. Having to use an in store credit within 2 weeks is ridiculous. 1. they all ready have the money , 2. the type of shop it is they may not have anything you want in that time span, 3. yes they have expenses, but all the merchandise is pure profit so........, 4. if you don't find anything you want in 2 weeks they get paid for selling nothing. They have lost a customer

resp.text: Sorry you feel that way most thrift stores dont even do credit  but now we dont do returns

name: Jessica Thornton
text: Went to check out some baby items they had outside and it was filthy and was not clean at all. Your charging 80.00 for a stroller and carseat make sure you clean it it up a little. Was very disappointed on the items. Yeah I could of went home and clean it but if I'm paying that price (cheaper than Walmart) I would think they would of clean it.

resp.text: Sorry i will mention it to my staff sorry for any inconvenience

name: Shari Smith
text: Our company, the National Service Cooperative, has worked with Jones McLeod for over 25 years.  They represent our organization in all of Alabama.  The reason that they are the Premier Service Provider for us is because of their commitment to excellence and to customer service.  With ever service call they perform, they send trained technicians with the parts needed to complete the repairs.  Their management team, led by Chris McLeod, is the best there is.  You are in the best hands when you select Jones McLeod!!

resp.text: Shari, Jones-McLeod is so thankful to have worked with the National Service Cooperative for all those years. Jones-McLeod loves taking care of all your commercial appliance service needs, whether it is in a restaurant, school, church, hospital, or any other facility with a commercial kitchen. So thankful for our partnership!

name: Bob Collier
text: Jones-McLeod are really convenient for the services that they offer. Their rates are competitive with anyone, their response time is good, and the office manager, Pat, is super friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Bob, thank you for the kind words. We at Jones-McLeod are very grateful for the opportunities to continue to earn your business! Thank you!

name: Hoyt Middleton
text: Staff was good and new what they were doing

resp.text: Hoyt, thank you for the kind words. Please let us know if you need help with any of your commercial appliance parts and service needs. thank you!

name: jessica Chen
text:
We had service with them several times, they were wonderful but last time they came couldn’t found what is problem with fryer and fryer just back working normal when they come so they just left doesn’t charge anything, I was appreciate they came even they didn’t do anything. But today my fryer don’t work again, I called up there and ask for service, they just told me can’t do any service for us no more, I asked why is there any reason to make y’all to do this to me? They just kept saying sorry we can’t do any service for you no more. I don’t really understand so I questioning him why? He told me he don’t want to argue with me, just they don’t service us no more. Wow..

That’s ridiculous. First, we never yelled out anybody . Second we gave you guys credit card info to trust you guys to charge us for service. Third the last time service which is couple days ago he couldn’t find the problem for the fryer So I asked him before he leave what if the fryer stop working again, he told me just call office for service. Then I ask him how about the charge? He answered he will not charge me this time but he doesn’t know if his boss going to charge or not. So I will just say thanks to him because I knew there is a fee for came out.  But I don’t think I will have a problem with you guys to collet the bills. You might need to talk to who came for the service first. Maybe they were lying for some reason.

resp.text: Mr. Chen, as we explained we can no longer render you service due to the fact that on multiple visits to your establishment we have had a difficult time getting paid for our services and our technicians and dispatchers have been yelled out on each occasion. Our rates were explained in advance and the technician clearly explained what was needed to repair the equipment prior to doing the repair. We were given the go ahead to proceed with the repair, but when the repair was complete the technician was told he would not be paid for the parts or service. Therefore we can no longer provide service to you. We will not send our technicians into that environment again.

name: Derek Landry
text: Great and friendly staff, very Knowledgeable. would give 10 stars if i could. will definitely be a repeat customer.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. Jones-McLeod Montgomery is always happy to be at your service!

name: Randall Phillips
text: The very best service company we have ever used. Kept me informed on what all was going on at the job-site and worked well with our customer at the job site and got the job done and everyone happy. Well be using this company again and future projects.

name: Sarah Barnett
text: Pat is so easy to work with!! I loved doing business with this company and will be a returning customer. They are fast, dependable and kind. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Sarah, thank you for your business and your kind words about Pat!

name: Ozzy Doner
text: Scammers!!! First the Service technician was just for 1h 20 minutes at my store and the second time he was just 35 Minutes here. The Part he replaced was $ 158,- he told me. They charged me almost $1300!!! For what???? Never ever again. And this goes straight to our attorney. I got Cameras in my Store.

resp.text: Mr. Doner, sorry, but we did not provide you service out of our Montgomery office.

name: Diep Trinh
text: They replaced the new compressor for my refrigerator, the temperature on the refrigerator does not cool enough. I keep calling them a week long. The lady receptionist either never pick up the phone or when she accidental pick up, she always promise to talk to the technician come out and check and will call me back in 5 minutes which she never call back and the technician never show up even I ask them just give me the appointment I can wait for few days if I have to. This offer still does not work, when I call back now when he hear my voice he hand up and I call back no one pick up. Mr, Carl normally was very good person and my husband loved to come to him for fixing. Maybe this is not the case anymore. I have to dispute the charge and looking for different company to fix my refrigerator. I would not give this company for even one star if I could. Please stay away from it if you don't want to waist your time and money.

name: Darrell Ogle
text: I would recommend them to family, so that says it all.  Nice to find a business you can trust to stand behind their work and their word.      Regards,. Darrell

name: fat mama's lunchbox
text: Its a great place to do business at.i will be back.

name: Hamid Baraty
text: Like most places, their inventory was reduced to a few things

resp.text: Thanks for the review and normally we keep our inventory full but we have been super busy and have not had a chance to restock inventory but we are working on restocking everyday

name: Cindy Moore
text: This is the best place in Huntsville to buy used appliances!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs Cindy for your rating/review. I am Mr Carls Daughter in law and just got your message from the lady you talked to next door to the shop. Im sorry you missed us but I will contact you in a few mins. Thank you again for the wonderful rating/review and ill be intouch soon. Have a blessed day.

name: Everette Hildreth
text: Owner and staff are very informative and professional. Quality service and quality appliances.

resp.text: Thank you Mr Everette for the 5 star rating.We try our very best to help our customers with all the information etc to the best of our ability and we enjoy being able to serve our community with great service and appliances

name: Beverly Strait
text: After calling at least 10 repair shops, Carl’s was only one to answer. I highly recommend Carls.  Great prices and great customer service.

name: Tony N.
text: We contacted Carl about fixing our Samsung dishwasher. Him and his son came out. They trouble shot the applicance and put part on order. Came out and replaced part (door switch) but unit still does not work properly. They told us another part which is under warranty was needed. They said it would take a week to get it in. Three weeks later nothing. Spoke to the lady at the office and left voicemails with Carl. Still nothing. They said they wouldn't charge us to install second part. I guess if they never come back out that is a true statement. Avoid this company. They come across as polite and reliable but they are far from it. We paid $174 for nothing.

name: Frankie Bradford Jr.
text: Bought an oven from there. Decent prices. I wish they were smoke free. Not a bad place to purchase appliances

name: Pat Easley
text: I bought a washer and dryer from Carl's Appliance  and have been thoroughly satisfied with them. I was very impressed with the delivery and service of the items. Jerry was awesome!

name: Winfred Peacock
text: As the proud owner of carls appliance service I have dedicated my time and almost 50 years of my life buying,selling, refurbishing used appliances and servicing people appliances in our communitys .I take pride in all my work and stand behind my work and warranty 100% .Come visit us at Carl's Appliance Service for all your major home appliances and or appliance parts new and used.YOU WONT BE DISAPPOINTED!!!!

name: Karen Eason
text: I bought a refrigerator here and got a great deal.  We're very happy with our purchase. I was by myself when I bought it and they were super friendly and loaded it onto my truck for me. He even lent me some straps to secure the fridge. When I returned them, he said thanks for bringing them back for the next person who needs them. Kinda nice to shop from an old school shop with old school ways..

name: elsha fornefeld
text: They gave us a great deal and gave us same day delivery and installation. I'll be coming back.

name: Steve Holland
text: Replacing my Dishwasher (KitchenAid).  Called to see if the would buy it. Carl asked for details on dishwasher and then asked how much I wanted. Told him to make an offer, he refused so I said a $100 if you will pick it up. ($900 originally). He quickly said he had all they need and hung up. So why did you ask the details first and no negotiation.  I would of give it to him free if he picked it up.

name: Richard Holcombe
text: Yeah said to carl been since Marcy was there he said gee that was 25 years since sister Marcy worked there we both hadn't seen her in a while

name: Belinda Isley
text: Ohhhh, I LOVE Mr. Carl!  Being new to an area is frustrating especially when the need for an appliance repair comes along.  Mr. Carl is AFFORDABLE, incredibly knowledgeable, prompt, and kind.  It is with much appreciation that I give Mr. Carl a 5 star rating and high regards!

name: Lisa Clark
text: Has a virility of used appliances, last time I was looking they were on the high price side.

name: Brandon Peacock
text: Excellent Help. And Experience in the Huntsville Area for 50+ years. And Reliable Service and Prompt to get things done. Best Deals inTown.

name: Cynthia Hervey
text: If you are looking for honesty with good quality service...you found it here. Enjoyed doing business.

name: Craig Boatright
text: He had the parts I needed to fix my appliance and the price was very reasonable.

name: troy kent
text: Nice honest old man who runs the place willing to help you find what you need

name: Michael Silletti
text: They are very friendly and helpful with a great selection of used and new appliances in Huntsville , Al .

name: Ken Carter
text: Carl was a wonderful man to do business with and wsd also a vreat listener as to what we exactly were looking for. His prices were reasonable and we were able to get all the appliances for our home within our budget. We will recomend him yo our friends

name: Jerry Peacock.
text: Very respectful people here they always take the time to listen to their customers and then they explain everything to where you can understand  it

name: Penny Morales
text: Fixed my refrigerator!  Hopefully he can repair my dishwasher today?  Honest and dependable.

name: Tashona
text: High prices. Do what they say will do and Honor their work.

name: Christina Beasley
text: Terrible customer service. We paid for a repair on a washing machine that broke in a week. They said they would be back and never came back. Avoid!

name: Vernon T. Mccants
text: I purchased a refrigerator some time ago from him and it broke down and I went to him and he got in his car and follow me to the house to attempt to fix it outstanding customer service

name: Jerry Peacock
text: Went in looking to buy a heating element for my dryer they checked it out told me it was good and told me what else to look for found the problem saved me 25$ good place to shop

name: Charles keith Tiller
text: Good service

name: John Wilson
text: Priced high

name: James Turner
text: Very good. Clean ! Nice staff. Food great.

name: Tracy Pickett
text: I was told my Samsung large capacity washer could not be repaired by a local appliance repair shop. I placed the washer on Facebook thinking on buying a new washing machine. Jonathan Harper responded on Facebook what he thought was wrong with it and came right out the very next morning.  He had machine up and running within a few minutes.  I highly recommend All star appliance! They saved me a lot of money!!! Very knowledgeable and professional!! 5 stars all the way!

resp.text: Tracy we appreciate your business. Let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: paula love
text: Great prices! Very nice and courteous owner.

resp.text: Thank you very much. Let us know if we can be of any more help.

name: Dillon Sellers
text: Bought a dryer from this place ,its a great dryer ,love it ,would go back and get another if needed

resp.text: Thank you so much. Let us know if we can help you again.

name: Robert Hillis
text: Owner is helpful and knowledgeable, this should be your first stop for appliance repair.

resp.text: Thank you very much. I'm glad we could help you.

name: Zac Burks
text: Recently bought a washer here. Works great and very friendly staff!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your business. Let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: Ariel Mcclendon
text: Very helpful. When received a dryer that wasn't working right they gave us a better one right away and they were very nice about helping.

name: cherrie pie
text: Love the two brothers I give them all my business from now on I'm on a washer and a dryer today and it was amazing

name: Nicole Oden
text: Bought an electric range from them, they were friendly and professional. In every way they were very helpful!

name: Ryan Iversen
text: Great deals and service!

resp.text: Thank you so much!

name: Gary Harper
text: Best used appliances in Cullman County. These brothers are doing it it right at a good price offering a 30 day warranty on each appliance and they take your old appliance in as a trade in. Offering delivery at additional cost. Located south of Cullman.

name: Baby Yoda
text: Ain't worth your time going. Horrible prices for used units.

resp.text: I'm sorry that you feel that way. Our average washer or dryer costs $150. If you can find them cheaper with a 30 day guarantee I would be skeptical about them.

name: Micah Rice
text: Great experience with these guys. Great service.

resp.text: Thank you very much!

name: Anthony Ledbetter
text: Great honest folks. Super nice.

name: Rachel Bridges
text: Best people in the area to do business with. Honest and knowledgeable. Highly recommend

name: Jonathan Harper
text: Best in the business in the Cullman Area!

name: julie sutherland
text:
Plenty of Appliances To Chose From.
But, WE Checked Other Stores As Well.
I Returned For An Plastic Cover For My Egg/Butter Bin For My Fridge.
I Passed On It For $35!
I Brought 2 Fridge Bins At "Dollar General" $4 Each! 1 For Eggs (Shelf), The Other For Butter, Boiled Eggs, Cheese, Etc. (Top Door). Otherwise, I Will Replace It On Line, It's Probably Much Cheaper!

name: Michael Carpenter
text: Loved it.  Nice and kind people. Very helpful

name: rodgetta colvin-jett
text:
Eddie the Manager of West Wood is an extremely nice man. I don't come across many Owner's or Mgr's that are concern about if they solved your situation or not. Not only did he check he helped me get someone that could help me get my dryer working. thank you Mr. EDDIE and I apologize for not knowing his last name. I would recommend this store to my Family and Friends.
Octavia R. C. Jett

resp.text: Thank you Miss Jett for the kind words. Glad we could help!

name: margie Glass
text: Very nice people would recommend everyone

name: Chi Quetta
text: Everyone here is beyond friendly and courteous. Ms. Barbara is awesome. She's very knowledgeable and thorough. I'll definitely be purchasing here again.

resp.text:
Thanks Miss Penick for the
Kind words. We appreciate
Your business and we will
Strive to continue to earn it.
Thanks again!

name: Clint Dixon
text:
A large family who all left reviews is one thing Westwood has going for it.   I know as sure as I  live and breath they didn’t get these reviews from customers .   Maybe 4-7 but not all those, they are the rudest most unprofessional bunch I’ve ever ran across .
When I walked in to the backyard garage appliance store I was struck by the snarky faces of the reps that I thought tend to be There to help you out in decision making, but not so at this establishment.  Atop of the Jeers and snarls I received It just amazed me that this joker has been in business for this long, and to still be adding business when they are so bad at what they do.
Go anywhere else but this dive.  Lowe’s I have absolutely no respect for you dealing with this clown college

resp.text: Sorry Clint, I don’t know where or what you experienced but I do know you wouldn’t have  gotten jeers or snarls or anything resembling that at my store. If there is a problem, I’d love to speak with you about it personally. Just ask for me personally, Eddie. I think our reputation speaks for itself.

name: T Moore
text: They had exactly what I needed. Needed a dryer belt. They gave me exactly what I needed quickly, even though they had several customers.

resp.text: 👍Thank you!

name: Malik McCullers
text: Gave me a Great Deal on a good LG Refrigerator...

name: Beverly Buckelew
text: Excellent customer service. Bought several items and they last a long time. No complaints. None. Highly recommend. No family relation just a satisfied  customer. Used them for  many years.

resp.text: Thank you Miss Buckelew for the kind review. We appreciate your business!!

name: Bianca Swanson
text: Excellent service, very respectful

name: Lynn Gibson
text: This business is very awesome all the way around. They are so honest and truly want to help even if that means they don't make money from you! This truth is rarely seen in this day and age and so I'm giving a huge shout out to Eddie and Westwood for being so amazingly honest and having the superb integrity they do! Also, Eddie was super knowledgeable and helped so much over the phone on having me check things to determine the correct part that was needed. I highly recommend Westwood over any other appliance store!

resp.text: Thank you Miss Gibson for the kind words. I’m glad we were able to help you out. It’s customers like you that makes it all worthwhile. Thanks!

name: Carol Galarneau
text: Great product & customer service.   Great prices.   Recommend highly!!!

name: Dawn Teeters
text: These guys are super helpful. I called to see if they had a part for my dryer. I drove almost an hour to get there because they were so helpful on the phone. When I got there he actually put the element in the housing for me and told me how to blow out the dryer vent at home to make sure it wasn't clogged. While I was there I saw they had nice used appliances they had fixed so I'll definitely be going back when I need to buy other appliances in the future. Thanks guys!

name: Jeff Blackwell
text: Good service and friendly

name: Tena J
text: He gave us a great deal on our stainless steel gas stove. Will see how things go. Update - 3mos later stove works I get compliments from friends and family on how nice it looks.

name: Dan Thomasson
text: They had the part I needed and were open later than anyone else on a Saturday.  When I arrived they had the part ready to go and provided a 90 day warranty which I am sure I will not need.  The service was quick and courteous.  I rarely write reviews but felt the need today because I got something here that was not available anywhere else in the Birmingham metro area today and now we have a functioning clothes dryer as a result.  Well worth the drive.  Thank you!

name: James Cato
text: I’ve bought appliances for years from Westwood Appliance,They were a big help on me needing a washing machine this week.Great Place & Great service. Thank You

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Cato. We appreciate your business!!

name: Regina Davis
text: Service was good, the prices were affordable. I was in and out within 15 minutes. The guys were even nice enough to load it for me. If you need an appliance and cant afford a new one, I recommend you try these guys first.

name: Kay Thomason
text: Good advice. Sales are informative, not pushy. The information on used appliances was honest and open. Nice

name: billy ferguson
text:
Great customer service! Bought a USED dryer and after a month it quit drying. Took ik back and they swapped it out since they did not have the part to repair our original dryer. Very friendly and courteous and sometimes used appliances break down so you could not ask for a better place to do business with.
Billy and Twanna

name: john shores
text: a fantastic place to go get honest service,  i have never had any problems with westwood, always good people, we have bought many washers and fridges from them, have had work done on machines, and always great service and a fair deal:) thank you:) we will always come back to you:)

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Shores for the kind words. We will continue to work hard to always earn your business. Thanks again!

name: Abdallah hop Ali
text: They have the best priced appliances.  They also give you the best customer service ever. I have purchased over and over and I have never had any issues.

name: tammy richardson
text: Great customer service

name: Eddie Fieselman
text: Use Westwood for years. Always great thanks Eddie

name: Ernie Adams
text: Dropped off front load washing machine for repair, very busy place they repair all kinds of major appliances and very friendly service

name: Alan Hudson
text: Good quality used appliances at very good prices. And a fantastic staff! Very helpful and friendly.

name: Furrball Nirpaw
text: Friendly and fast service. Good prices and some parts in stock. Very helpful place.

name: Uche Bean
text: Okay selection for refurbished appliances. Not too expensive. Sometimes you can catch a good deal. They deliver too which is a plus!

name: Junior Jaimes
text: Well I'm a customer and I haven't had no trouble with them. I have a pleasant experience

name: john redd
text: Our family has traded there for 20 years,they  are friendly ,helpful and economicle..have recommended them numerous times...John R...

name: Peyton and freinds
text: VERY HELPFUL!  I will tell everybody i know to check them out!! Very pleased with products and service!!

name: fat mama's lunchbox
text: They have the best appliance's in town and u can't beat there prices

name: Ms Q
text: I don't have alot of experience taking appliances to be fixed however hands down loved this experience not only did they fix it but the gentleman that helped me was super welcoming and happy for our business with them. He also explained what broke and the causes for it possibly breaking so we can fix that so it doesn't break again. They had it fixed, wrapped and loaded back on my truck within 15 mins. Ty!!

name: Shametris Jones
text: By far the worst experience I have received from a appliances store. I would never recommend anyone to spend money here. I purchased a washer and dryer set in February 2018. My washer didn't even last a full year. I was told it would take $200 or more to fix. In the same breath he told me they have a washer for sell for $225. Needless to say I will not be purchasing another anything from them.

resp.text: Ms. Jones I’m sorry that you had a bad experience. I couldn’t find you in our system. If you can please give us a call, so I can look up your purchase. We will be happy to try to work something out with you, because we do want y’all to get good service out of our machines. If you had talked to me personally we could have worked something out with you. Even though it is well out of warranty, we could’ve worked something out far less than $200.

name: Michael Shemwell
text: Good people there not out to rob you you have a problem with something see Eddie good folks here

name: David McKinney
text: Very good prices products and service quick diagnostics of your house hold appliances and a 30 day warranty.

name: Tracy Johnson
text: They were very helpful I found what I needed at a good price.thanks Larry on delivery.

name: Chantelle Davis
text: Great customer service!!! Wanda was great!

name: Greg Fanin
text: Best folks for appliances bar none.  GF

name: James Jones
text: Cheap products excellent service

name: Emetrice Russell-Brewer
text: I swear by their appliances. My family has been rolling with Westwood for over 20years and counting😍

name: margo rozell
text: I found it to be a nice place to shop

name: Michael Hervey
text: Good people with great deals.

name: Zora Carter
text: Great customer service

name: TaShara Smith
text: That are great

text:
(Translated by Google) Xeexelenetes presios great products are cm new 100% recommended you find electric stoves and gas refrigerators washing machines dryers a week ago I bought a stove on this site and it works perfectly without counting that they gave three months of guarantee I returned xq the burners were fading and junior very kindly m he replaced them with totally new ones👌so they always value the work of Mexicans xq the boy provides excellent service 👏🦋

name: leigh mccurry Fierro
text: Awesome ladies! Great customer service

name: Keli Kirby
text: It has been a great experience working with this company. Ali was very pleasant in obtaining a washer and dryer. Jess was absolutely fabulous installing the washer and dryer. I highly recommend this company.

name: Gretchen Price
text: My dryer died this weekend and had to buy a new one. Bought it this morning and they were able to deliver really fast. My precious!

name: Chad W
text: These people are honest & knowledgeable & take care of customers by providing dependable service & reasonable pricing. I am truly satisfied with the quality of work & am confident to have reliable Econo Tech appliances! Very well established company with a reputable service!

name: Holly M
text: Staff is not only kind but extremely knowledgeable. Products are thoroughly tested and clean. Reliable company and a great asset to Athens.

name: Jasmin S
text: They go the extra mile. Very impressed with this company. They are genuinely good people!

name: Kristi
text: What a  great service!! If you are looking to make your life easier I highly recommend it!! I have used Exonotech multiple times and every time the service has been super!! I just make one phone call for my old appliances to be picked up! I have also bought gently used washer and dryers from them which work perfectly and saved me a lot of money!! Anytime I need a good working appliance or need an old one picked up I call Econotech!!

name: Ali M
text: Very professional business & exceptional customer service!

name: lbauer51
text:
My Roper clothes washer quit cycling last weekend.
Called my son who came and loaded it in his truck and took it to Mike to take a look at. He picked it up at 10 am Tuesday and Mike identified the problem as a bad lid safety switch, replaced it, then called my boy to come pick it up. From pick up to back in place and running about seven hours. And because we brought it in and took it back Mike charged us a very reasonable fee.

name: Greg
text: Mike is an honest and knowledgeable guy and I’m glad I found his place.  He understands that being up front and providing quality product is what brings people back, not cutting corners and being deceptive.  I will definitely give him more business and send folks his way.

name: Pretty Redalert
text: Trash! Sold me a not-so-hot dryer. And the warranty is useless unless you can bring the appliance back to him. Otherwise, he charges you a $50 service call if he comes to you and nothing is wrong. What kind of BS is that? NEVER EVER EVER will I buy anything from them again!!! Save your time and money and buy one from Home Depot or Lowe’s!! 🤬👎

name: Matt James
text: Great guy. Had what I needed for a fair price.

name: Kathleen Clayton
text: Love this guy. Great washing machine, he delivered and installed same day. Recommended to anyone needing appliances

name: John Burson
text: My washer stopped working and Mike got someone out to fix it that day. He honored the warranty even though it had expired by a few weeks. Mike really takes care of his customers!

name: Amy Mannahan
text: I bought a refrigerator washer and dryer and had a refrigerator repaired from this establishment. The Owner and Delivery Man are very professional and customer oriented. This is a great place to shop for appliances. Great people!

resp.text: Thanks Amy! So glad you're happy. Our customers mean a lot to us!

name: Luke Hudgin
text: I wish I could give more than 5 stars; this guy takes care of his customers. Mike is very honest and skilled and has consistently favored sound advice and customer satisfaction over making more money from me. I've purchased multiple appliances from his shop and have only had very positive experiences. I’ve given him return business and he has offered me great deals, lower than his advertised prices. Extremely pleased, will not go anywhere else for appliances for as long as I live here.

name: david martin
text: I buy a lot from Mike, being in the rental business.  Always fair and stands behind his products!

name: N Flippo
text: Mike is informative, friendly, helpful, and accommodating. Rocket City Appliance has a large stock of appliances and parts and if you're looking for a machine that runs like new for the price of a used one, this is the place to get it.

name: Dominique Jones
text: I bought a refrigerator from him and I’ve had it for about three months now and it still works just fine. I’ve unplugged it to clean and plugged it back it in and still gets cool just the same. Thank you

name: Collin C
text: Bought a washer & dryer set for a fair price and had them delivered and installed by Dave. He showed up on time and was very friendly and knowledgeable. The appliances came with a 30-day warranty and so far they work well.
